SEARCH
Package uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop

Class GameWorld.VehicleState

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.GameWorld.VehicleState
Enclosing class:
GameWorld
public static class GameWorld.VehicleState extends Object
A helper class that stores the initial state of a vehicle.

When you start the simulation, we save where each vehicle is, which way it's facing, and what it's attached to. This class stores that information so we can reset the simulation back to the beginning later.

Think of it like saving your game - this stores one vehicle's save data.

  • Constructor Details

    • VehicleState

      public VehicleState(Vehicle v)
      Creates a snapshot of a vehicle's current state.

      This constructor captures everything about the vehicle right now: where it is, which way it's facing, what it's attached to, etc. Later we can use this information to reset the vehicle back to this state.

      Parameters:
      v - the vehicle whose state we want to save
